meeting_request.purpose: Feeling lost and uncertain about my career path
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Ryan, a senior Art major in my final year. I’ve enjoyed the course very much, but I’m also feeling a bit disillusioned about what the future holds for the arts. I’ve always loved art, but I don’t know if I want to pursue a career in it. I’m not sure what I should be studying or doing, and I feel like I’m losing touch with what I’m passionate about. I’m also worried about the economic and social impact of the arts, and I’m worried that I might be leaving something important behind if I don’t figure out what to do soon.
